sentences.en: Four rescue plans are vying to save the zoo.
sentences.cn: 4个拯救动物园的方案正争得不可开交。

sentences.en: He determined to rescue his two countrymen.
sentences.cn: 他决意营救自己的两名同胞。

sentences.en: Her own boat capsized after she attempted a rescue.
sentences.cn: 她在设法营救别人时自己的船也翻了.

sentences.en: His daring rescue saved the lives of the youngsters.
sentences.cn: 他的大胆营救保住了那些年轻人的性命。

sentences.en: Lights clipped onto life jackets improve the chances of rescue.
sentences.cn: 别在救生衣上的灯提高了获救可能性。

sentences.en: Rescue crews had scoured an area of 30 square miles.
sentences.cn: 救援人员已经搜遍了30平方英里的范围。

sentences.en: Rescue crews have been digging people out of collapsed buildings.
sentences.cn: 救援人员一直在倒塌的建筑物废墟中挖掘救人。

sentences.en: Rescue services have been working round the clock to free stranded motorists.
sentences.cn: 救援部门一直在日夜不停地工作，解救被困司机。

sentences.en: Rescue teams recovered more bodies from the rubble.
sentences.cn: 救援队从瓦砾中挖出了更多尸体。

sentences.en: Rescue workers are digging through the rubble in search of other victims.
sentences.cn: 救援人员正在废墟中挖掘，以搜寻其他受害者。

sentences.en: She had brought her trained sheepdog to help in the rescue.
sentences.cn: 她带来了经过训练的牧羊犬帮助营救。

sentences.en: Survivors of the crash were rescued by helicopter.
sentences.cn: 空难的生还者被直升机救了出来。

sentences.en: Survivors waited for the rescue boats, dazed and frightened.
sentences.cn: 生还者不知所措，心有余悸，等待着救援船只。

sentences.en: The 23-year-old's screams alerted a passerby who went to her rescue.
sentences.cn: 那个23岁女孩的尖叫引来了一位过路人前去营救。

sentences.en: The air rescue operation has now been scaled down.
sentences.cn: 空中救援行动的规模现在已经有所缩小。

sentences.en: We diverted a plane to rescue 100 passengers.
sentences.cn: 我们让一架飞机改变航线去营救100名乘客。
